docs.snippet: Albright College in eastern Pennsylvania is condemning an online video posted by two white students, including one in blackface who lampoons the "Black Lives Matter" movement....
docs.lead_paragraph: Albright College in eastern Pennsylvania is condemning an online video posted by two white students, including one in blackface who lampoons the "Black Lives Matter" movement.

headline.main: Pennsylvania College Condemns Students' Blackface Video
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania College Condemns Students' Blackface Video

docs.snippet: In an effort to catch up to rival services like Facebook, Twitter will now allow people to shoot, edit and post video directly from its mobile apps. Also, private messages on the service can now be sent to as many as 20 people....
docs.abstract: In an effort to catch up to rival services like Facebook, Twitter will now allow people to shoot, edit and post video directly from its mobile apps. Also, private messages on the service can now be sent to as many as 20 people.

headline.main: Twitter Adds Group Messaging and Video Recording
headline.print_headline: Twitter Adds Group Messages and More

docs.snippet: A former Massachusetts Uber driver charged with raping a 16-year-old passenger has collapsed and sobbed in court, briefly delaying his arraignment....

docs.snippet: "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" is the leading nominee at next month's MTV Movie Awards, where it will compete with "Creed," ''Deadpool," ''Jurassic World," ''Avengers: Age of Ultron" and "Straight Outta Compton" for movie of the year....
